name: Froslass
author: Kagemaru Himeno
flavor_text: It freezes foes with an icy breath nearly -60 degrees F. What seems to be its body is actually hollow.

attacks.name: Destiny Bond
attacks.effect: Discard a {P} Energy attached to Froslass. During your opponent’s next turn, if Froslass would be Knocked Out by damage from an attack, the Attacking Pokémon is Knocked Out.

attacks.name: Icy Breath
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep. Put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon.
